includedAssets.title: The Long Honeymoon
includedAssets.synopsis: Cam and Mitch return from their honeymoon and adjust to married life as season six of the Emmy-winning US comedy gets under way.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cam and Mitch return from their honeymoon and adjust to married life as season six of the Emmy-winning US comedy gets under way.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Cam and Mitch return from their honeymoon and adjust to married life as season six of the Emmy-winning US comedy gets under way.

includedAssets.title: Don't Push
includedAssets.synopsis: Jay and Gloria celebrate their anniversary but can't decide on what kind of gift to give. The Dunphys, meanwhile, join Alex on her college tour.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jay and Gloria celebrate their anniversary but can't decide on what kind of gift to give. The Dunphys, meanwhile, join Alex on her college tour.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jay and Gloria celebrate their anniversary but can't decide on what kind of gift to give. The Dunphys, meanwhile, join Alex on her college tour.

includedAssets.title: The Cold
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil tries to cover his tracks while editing Mitch and Cam's wedding video. Plus, 'manny' Andy (guest star Adam DeVine) is welcomed back into the fold.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Phil tries to cover his tracks while editing Mitch and Cam's wedding video. Plus, 'manny' Andy (guest star Adam DeVine) is welcomed back into the fold
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Phil tries to cover his tracks while editing Mitch and Cam's wedding video. Plus, 'manny' Andy (guest star Adam DeVine) is welcomed back into the fold.

includedAssets.title: Marco Polo
includedAssets.synopsis: Cabin fever settles in when the Dunphys are forced to share a single hotel room. Cam, meanwhile, tries to keep his team's winning streak going.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cabin fever settles in when the Dunphys are forced to share a single hotel room. Cam, meanwhile, tries to keep his team's winning streak going.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Cabin fever settles in when the Dunphys are forced to share a single hotel room. Cam, meanwhile, tries to keep his team's winning streak going.

includedAssets.title: Won't You Be Our Neighbor
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep5 - Won't You Be Our Neighbor
includedAssets.synopsis: Nightmare new neighbours descend on the Dunphys, while Jay is furious to learn that Manny is dating the granddaughter of a rival.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nightmare new neighbours descend on the Dunphys, while Jay is furious to learn that Manny is dating the granddaughter of a rival.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nightmare new neighbours descend on the Dunphys, while Jay is furious to learn that Manny is dating the granddaughter of a rival.

includedAssets.title: Halloween 3: Awesomeland
includedAssets.synopsis: Halloween may be Claire's favourite holiday, but, this year, she must pass the baton on to Phil. Jay, meanwhile, grows attached to his costume.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Halloween may be Claire's favourite holiday, but, this year, she must pass the baton on to Phil. Jay, meanwhile, grows attached to his costume.

includedAssets.title: Queer Eyes, Full Hearts
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep7 - Queer Eyes, Full Hearts
includedAssets.synopsis: Haley tries to land a job with an influential stylist (Ugly Betty's Michael Urie), while Gloria hires a hot Spanish teacher for Manny.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Haley tries to land a job with an influential stylist (Ugly Betty's Michael Urie), while Gloria hires a hot Spanish teacher for Manny.

includedAssets.title: Three Turkeys
includedAssets.synopsis: Claire has her doubts when Phil steps up to the plate to cook Thanksgiving dinner. Plus, roles are reversed after Cam is forced to play bad cop.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Claire has her doubts when Phil steps up to the plate to cook Thanksgiving dinner. Plus, roles are reversed after Cam is forced to play bad cop.

includedAssets.title: Strangers In The Night
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep9 - Strangers In The Night
includedAssets.synopsis: Mitch reluctantly lets a distressed colleague stay over, and Jay hits a Manny-shaped obstacle while trying to avoid attending a party.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mitch reluctantly lets a distressed colleague stay over, and Jay hits a Manny-shaped obstacle while trying to avoid attending a party.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mitch reluctantly lets a distressed colleague stay over, and Jay hits a Manny-shaped obstacle while trying to avoid attending a party.

includedAssets.title: Haley's 21st Birthday
includedAssets.synopsis: Celebrations are in order as Haley turns 21 and, while the grown-ups hit a bar, Alex, Manny and Luke are left to babysit Lily.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Celebrations are in order as Haley turns 21 and, while the grown-ups hit a bar, Alex, Manny and Luke are left to babysit Lily.

includedAssets.title: The Day We Almost Died
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep11 - The Day We Almost Died
includedAssets.synopsis: While driving back from breakfast, the Dunphys - and Manny - have a brush with death that prompts them to re-evaluate their lives.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While driving back from breakfast, the Dunphys - and Manny - have a brush with death that prompts them to re-evaluate their lives.

includedAssets.title: The Big Guns
includedAssets.synopsis: All-out war is declared when Claire confronts the next door neighbours about their eyesore of a boat. Plus, Cam takes Lily to clown school.

includedAssets.title: Rash Decisions
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil finds a stand-in son after being given the cold shoulder by Luke, and Jay has a Stella-shaped dilemma on his hands.

includedAssets.title: Valentine's Day 4: Twisted Sister
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep14 - Valentine's Day 4: Twisted Sister
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil and Claire dust off their alter-egos Clive and Juliana, while Jay's romantic plans are interrupted by Gloria's sister.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Phil and Claire dust off their alter-egos Clive and Juliana, while Jay's romantic plans are interrupted by Gloria's sister.

includedAssets.title: Fight Or Flight
includedAssets.synopsis: Phil and Claire head home after a weekend away with the former's cheer buddies, while Mitch and Cam throw Sal a belated baby shower.

includedAssets.title: Connection Lost
includedAssets.synopsis: Stuck at an airport with just her laptop to hand, Claire tries to track down Haley, who has gone off the grid following a row.

includedAssets.title: Closet?  You'll Love It!
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep17 - Closet?  You'll Love It!
includedAssets.synopsis: While Jay and Claire butt heads shooting a commercial, Phil, Luke and Manny try to track down a peeping Tom spying on Gloria.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Jay and Claire butt heads shooting a commercial, Phil, Luke and Manny try to track down a peeping Tom spying on Gloria.

includedAssets.title: Spring Break
includedAssets.synopsis: Bickering is replaced by bonding when Haley whisks Alex off to a music festival. Plus, Phil reluctantly accepts that he's no spring chicken.

includedAssets.title: Grill Interrupted
includedAssets.synopsis: Jay's birthday has arrived and Phil thinks he's found the perfect present. An awkward encounter is on the cards for Haley and Andy, too.

includedAssets.title: Knock 'Em Down

includedAssets.title: Intergrity
includedAssets.synopsis: Bad moods must be catching when Phil and Jay spend the afternoon together. Gloria, meanwhile, teaches Haley how to stand up to her boss.

includedAssets.title: Patriot Games
includedAssets.synopsis: While Alex goes head-to-head with a school rival, Gloria prepares for her US citizenship test, only to be thrown off her game by Javier.

includedAssets.title: Crying Out Loud
includedAssets.synopsis: Claire is in a quandary after receiving a lucrative job offer. The rest of the Dunphys, meanwhile, want Alex to enjoy her senior ditch day.

includedAssets.title: American Skyper
includedAssets.synopsis: Season six concludes as the family celebrates Alex's graduation and Phil must find a way to be there despite being stuck in Seattle.

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Big changes are in store for the family as Cam and Mitch adjust to married life, Hayley turns 21 and Alex prepares to graduate high school. Season six of the smash-hit comedy starring Ty Burrell and Sofia Vergara.
